languages.text: "Не забывай о милосердии, пастырь. Оно не менее важно, чем правосудие".
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
languages.original_text: "Не забывай о милосердии, пастырь. Оно не менее важно, чем правосудие".

traits.locale_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."
"Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

languages.text: “别忘了仁慈待人，善良的牧人，仁慈与正义同样重要。”
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了仁慈待人，善良的牧人，仁慈与正义同样重要。”

languages.text: 「慈悲を忘れるな、良き羊飼いよ。正義と同じくらい大切なものだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲を忘れるな、良き羊飼いよ。正義と同じくらい大切なものだ」

languages.text: «No se olvide de la misericordia. Es tan importante como la justicia».
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: «No se olvide de la misericordia. Es tan importante como la justicia».

languages.text: "Vergesst die Gnade nicht, guter Hirte. Sie ist ebenso wichtig wie die Gerechtigkeit."
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst die Gnade nicht, guter Hirte. Sie ist ebenso wichtig wie die Gerechtigkeit."

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas, bon berger, que la miséricorde est aussi importante que la justice. »
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas, bon berger, que la miséricorde est aussi importante que la justice. »

languages.text: "Merhameti de unutma iyi yürekli çoban. O da adalet kadar önemlidir."
languages.original_text: "Do not forget about mercy, good shepherd. It is as important as justice."

traits.locale_text: "Merhameti de unutma iyi yürekli çoban. O da adalet kadar önemlidir."
